ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: The Envoy
ComicInfo.Summary:
GOOD NEWS and BAD NEWS: We've made successful alien contact and as a result, cured cancer. But is that the good news, or the bad? Because there's a downside. Because there is an opposite number to the Envoy, a gracile golden visitor who has come to heal: the flipside visitor which looks pretty much like Lovecraft's worst nightmare.
Writer David J. Schow (THE CROW, JC’S TALES FOR A HALLOWEENIGHT, JC’S TALES OF SCIENCE FICTION: THE STANDOFF) and artist Andres Esparza (JC’S TALES OF SCIENCE FICTION: VAULT and THE STANDOFF, JC’S TALES FOR A HALLOWEENIGHT) team up once again, to bring you THE ENVOY #3 (of 3), the ELEVENTH story in John Carpenter’s monthly anthology series Tales of Science Fiction.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/john-carpenters-tales-of-science-fiction-the-envoy/4000-1024666/
ComicInfo.Writer: David Schow,David J. Schow,David J. Schow
ComicInfo.Title: The Envoy Chapter 3
